name: Untitled PSX Silent Hill Inspired Game Prototype
name_original: Untitled PSX Silent Hill Inspired Game Prototype
description:
A birth of a new nostalgic PS1/PSX styled horror game that resembles the silent hill and resident evil experience with static camera angles and text scrolling. Note that this is just a prototype (not even a demo)  of the game.  Development is ongoing and lots of features, contents, and story lines shall be added.

The game title is yet to be defined, the plot, name of the character, the enemies, etc... I would like to make a game with a protagonist that has a story worth playing for.... A solid story line that would drive players to discover and play more. A horror that resonates the silent hill experience and make players swallow their own saliva by just hearing the background music.

I'm a solo developer with a great vision for this project, and I would like to ask for your support to make all these things possible. Your suggestions are highly appreciated as this game will be for all of us. If you would like to support the development of the game, you can express it by being a Patreon. I'll be posting devlogs on my patreon page and update you guys from time to time, not mentioning the benefits you will get from being a true supporter.

Be a supporter: https://www.patreon.com/solodevinteractive

Controls:

  • W / Up Arrow - Move forward
  • S / Back Arrow - Move backward
  • A / Left Arrow - Rotate player left
  • D / RIght Arrow - Rotate player right
  • Shift - Run
  • E - Interact
  • X / Esc - Cancel
